title: Someone Eats a Banana with The Peel in The 'Shell On' Challenge + Lunchbox Goes Vigilante in Amy's Neighborhood
itunes:title: Someone Eats a Banana with The Peel in The 'Shell On' Challenge + Lunchbox Goes Vigilante in Amy's Neighborhood
description:
We go through two rounds of the "Shell on Challenge" where the loser has to eat a piece of fruit with the peel on. Amy says she thinks there is a woman handing out something suspicious in her neighborhood to people who drive by. Lunchbox goes in with a hidden mic to investigate if there really is a crime going down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
